This is a short demo that explains how to create and plot gTracks.

```{r include = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(gTrack)
library(gUtils)
```

# Creating gTracks

gTracks can be created from GRanges, GRangesList, and Matrix objects. In addition, we have written a few R packages in which objects include a gTrack constructor (usually invoked by calling the `$gt` or `$gtrack` methods.
